code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{borrarAlumno}from"../services/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function EliminarAlumno(_ref){let{mensaje}=_ref;const[id,setId]=useState("");const eliminar=()=>{if(!id){mensaje("Debes indicar un ID","error");return;}borrarAlumno(id).then(res=>{if(res.ok){mensaje("Alumno eliminado correctamente","ok");setId("");}else{mensaje("Error al eliminar alumno","error");}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Eliminar Alumno"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"ID",value:id,onChange:e=>setId(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:eliminar,children:"Eliminar"})]});}export default EliminarAlumno;
